rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 16 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 2:42 PM, 07 July 2025(Monday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Zambales, Bataan, Quezon, Bulacan, Rizal, Laguna, Metro Manila, Batangas and Cavite within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Nueva Ecija(Palayan, General Mamerto Natividad, Cabanatuan, Pantabangan, San Antonio), Tarlac(San Clemente, Camiling, Mayantoc, Concepcion) and Pampanga(Magalang) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
